Change Log
==========

0.0.1(6/11/2022)
----------------
- First Release

0.0.2(6/11/2022)
- Fixed Import Error

0.0.3(6/11/2022)
- Added Read Function

0.0.4(6/11/2022)
- Added Unlist Parameter To All Functions That Read The File. The Unlist Parameter Makes It So That You Can Convert The (Readed) Text List To A Regular String

0.0.5(6/16/2022)
- Added Logger With Log Class Functionalities

0.0.6(6/16/2022)
- Updated README.txt For The Logger Class

0.0.7(6/16/2022)
- Fixed __init__.py For Logger Send_Methods, Forgot To Pass The Self Parameter.
